column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/71f82bf2ab6f5ddcbf155ae0c1dcc4606b51c451 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK, good catch. This indeed requires a restart because it affects the balance computation.\n
